title: North Royalton City School District's Enriched Language Arts students RISE to the Challenge

organizations.name: north royalton city school district's enriched language arts

text: On March 22, 2017, the North Royalton City Schools' Research and Independence Study Extravaganza (RISE) was held at North Royalton Middle School.  Enriched English Language Arts students in grades three through eight conducted formal research on a topic of their...
